column1: # ESP32 Partition Table - OTA Support (LATER Phase)
# WARNING: Do NOT enable this partition table until OTA firmware update
# feature is ready for implementation. Use default partitions for NOW phase.
# To enable: Uncomment board_build.partitions in platformio.ini
# This partition scheme supports Over-The-Air (OTA) firmware updates:
# - Two app partitions (ota_0 and ota_1) for A/B firmware updates
# - otadata partition to track which app is active
# App Partitions: ~1.9MB each (sufficient for M3 Data Logger firmware)
